name: Australian Tax Office. 2008. Taxation Ruling: TR 2008/4
description:
DESCRIPTION
Estimate for life expectancy of shuttle cars under table "Effective lives (Industry Categories)", sub-table "MINING (06000 to 10900)" on pg 45 (pdf pg 46).

FULL CITATION
Australian Tax Office. 2008. Taxation Ruling: TR 2008/4. Commonwealth of Australia. http://law.ato.gov.au/atolaw/view.htm?docid=TXR/TR20084/NAT/ATO/00001&PiT=20080625000001#PB (Accessed December 14, 2009).
